name: Matcha & Bubble
description:
Journey through a charming Tea Shop filled with personified drinks. The Caffeinated Crew,  on a mission to purge all non-caffeinated drinks, takes Lemonade hostage. Save Lemonade with Matcha Latte and Bubble Tea before it's too late!

Arrow or WASD controls. Space to jump. 

Art, Sound, & Narrative: 

Skylar (ig @skyesongss)

Programming:

Elizabeth (twt @Lizsun03)
